Hello everyone, my name is John Stamos and here is my quite unusual story ...

I was born into a well to do family, so when I wanted something I usually got it, so when I became 18 years old I told my Father that I wanted to learn to fly a plane.

It was not even a week when I had my first pilot lesson, and after a month of flying lessons I got my Pilot licence, so naturally My next request was for my father to buy me my own small plane.

Two weeks later I had a small two engine private plane, and here my friends, is where things got really weird.

I was flying my charted path and enjoying a beautiful sunny sky warm day when in front of me I thought I saw something shimmering directly in my path, as I continued flying, not sure if what I thought I saw was real, I started rubbing my eyes thinking that I somehow was hallucinating but when I looked back up from rubbing my eyes, the shimmering space in front of me was getting wider and wider, stretching across the sky.

I was freaking out at this point and tried to swerve my plane out of the range but there was nowhere to go, and then as I crossed over into the shimmering sky, everything started to spiral, I was flying through what could only be described as an immense tunnel, full of swirling colors and lights, I had no choice other than to just hold on, I couldn't stear my plane at all, and then I must have blacked out for a bit, for when I came to again, I was flying in clear sunny blue skies again.

I tried to radio in my location but there was only silence, I tried several more times but it was as if there was no other radios out there working amymore.
I finally saw a stretch of beach that was wide and flat and a long stretch so I could land my plane.

It was a rough landing and I was proud of myself for landing my plane without tearing it apart.

I finally exit my plane and only see the beach and tree lines.
